metadata.title: Ross-Simons 2.20 Carat Garnet Ring With Diamond Accents in 14kt Yellow Gold
features: 14kt yellow gold, garnet and diamond accent ring for women.
2.20 ct. t.w. garnet, 0.04 ct. t.w. diamond accent. 3/8" wide.
Burgundy garnet and round shape diamond accent. Polished 14kt yellow gold.

Includes jewelry presentation box. Due to the naturally occurring characteristics of gemstones, each is unique and may exhibit imperfections such as inclusions , blemishes and cloudiness, as well as color variations.
description: Developing fresh ways to wear timeless looks, Ross-Simons masters the classics. On this ring, a 2.20 carat emerald-cut garnet is flanked by diamond accented chevrons. Features an open 14kt yellow gold setting. 3/8" wide. Garnet ring. Each Ross-Simons item arrives in a fine jewelry presentation box.
